name: Super Hotel Tycoon
description:
How to be the richest man in the world?Hotel business is of course the best choice!

-Get start with a small three-floor hotel, ern your fisrt barrel of gold.
-Then expand your business, get more rooms, open amazing business house, build more floors, rate your hotel from non-star to five-star!
-With more money, you can open more chain hotels all over the world, from New York to Paris, Tyoko to Dubai.

After all your effort, sooner or later you will be the richest man in the world. Now let's just get start and enjoy this amazing journey!
